message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'm the one who will make the big offer
You said I could have less, now it's your turn to compromise!
You want me to compromise, I'll give you a little less
You're not willing to budge, so I'll take the lead!
I'm not backing down, but I'll give you a bit more
You're not serious about compromising, so I'll take what I can get!
I'm not giving up yet, you're getting closer to a fair deal
You're running out of time, Bob. It's time to make a serious offer!
I'm not giving up, I'll make a serious offer now
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never, I'll take what's left
